description.p: A community-made mode for MCPI-Reborn by MCPI Revival, which itself is a mod of Minecraft: Pi Edition by Mojang. The mod adds tons of cool new features, like:

- Working sounds - Sprinting via the [CTRL] key - 1.18 textures - Custom skins - Sneaking via both the Shift and Alt keys - A custom "Cursed Chest" block - Ability to look around via arrow keys instead of mouse (useful if mouse is glitched) - Coloured terminal output
and soooo much more! For more info, check out the github repository or drop by our support server: https://discord.gg/XJJNG9jTuh.
